div.em: Current conditions as of 29 Apr 11:55 am CDT

div.div: A 20 percent chance of showers after 3pm. Partly sunny, with a high near 67. Windy, with a north northwest wind around 29 mph, with gusts as high as 40 mph.

A 10 percent chance of showers before 7pm. Mostly clear, with a low around 42. Breezy, with a west northwest wind 16 to 21 mph decreasing to 6 to 11 mph after midnight. Winds could gust as high as 29 mph.
Sunny, with a high near 74. Northwest wind 5 to 7 mph becoming calm in the morning.
